Module: camera_anim

Camera animation add-on. Provides support for camera procedural animation.
Source:
  • addons/camera_anim.js, line 3

Methods

(static) auto_rotate(auto_rotate_ratio, Optional)

Auto-rotate the MS_TARGET camera around the pivot point and auto-rotate the MS_EYE camera about itself.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
auto_rotate_ratio Number Speed ratio of the camera
Optional mouse_event_callback callback
Source:
  • addons/camera_anim.js, line 235

(static) track_to_target(camobj, target, rot_speed, zoom_mult, zoom_time, zoom_delay, zoom_cbopt)

Make the camera object track the target (object or point).
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
camobj Object Camera Object ID
target Object | Float32Array Target object or target position
rot_speed Number Rotation speed in radians per second
zoom_mult Number Zoom level value
zoom_time Number The time it takes to zoom on the target
zoom_delay Number Delay before the camera zooms back
zoom_cb zoom_callback <optional>
 Optional zoom callback
Source:
  • addons/camera_anim.js, line 42
